Loops Beauty Weekly Reset

Brand: Loops

Category: Mask

Ingredients: Water, Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, Propanediol, Ceratonia Siliqua (Carob) Gum, Polyglycerin-3, Chondrus Crispus Powder, Panthenol, Hydroxyacetophenone, Allantoin, Betaine, Xanthan Gum, Chlorphenesin, Hydroxyethyl Urea, Cellulose Gum, Glucomannan, Disodium EDTA, Potassium Chloride,

Potassium Chloride, Dextrin, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Iron Oxides (CI 77491), Adenosine, Tocopherol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Honey Extract, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Extract, Oenothera Biennis (Evening Primrose) Flower Extract, Pinus Palustris Leaf Extract, Pueraria Thunbergiana Root Extract, Ulmus Davidiana Root Extract

Ingredient concer

t

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
